requirements.summary: Add a centered, visually secondary H2 subtitle directly below the existing hero title on the earthquake dashboard without altering other dashboard content or layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section shows the existing title text unchanged: "Real - Time Earthquake Detection Around The World".
A second line appears immediately below the title and is rendered as an H2 with exact text: "Latest real-time earthquake information around the world".
The new subtitle is center-aligned and clearly styled as secondary (e.g., smaller font size and/or muted foreground) across breakpoints.
No other dashboard sections (controls, summary, table/map/split views, footer) change behavior or content.

file_operations.description: In the Hero Section, keep the existing centered hero title unchanged and add a new H2 subtitle immediately below it with exact text "Latest real-time earthquake information around the world". Ensure subtitle remains center-aligned and styled as visually secondary via Tailwind classes (smaller typography and/or muted foreground), without affecting other dashboard sections or modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
